drastically improves.from sentence: As shown in , Max - pooling described in Section 2.2 drastically improves performance , showing the effect of accumulating information on entities .

99 % confidence intervals.from sentence: The 99 % confidence intervals of the results of full DER Network and the one initialized by word2vec on the test set were [ 0.700 , 0.740 ] and [ 0.708 , 0.749 ] , respectively ( measured by bootstrap tests ) .

has.from sentence: Further , we note that initializing our model with pre-trained word vectors 10 is helpful , though world knowledge of entities has been prevented by the anonymization process .

best results.from sentence: Finally , we note that our model , full DER Network , shows the best results compared to several previous reader models , endorsing our approach as promising .
